name: Alpha City News Team
description:
Every city needs a news media, and so this is Alpha City's news source! We are on 24/7 and there's always someone online, so contact them! AC is under control from Alpha Authority, the main group. Be sure to join the group too!

---------------------------------------
https://www.roblox.com/my/groups.aspx

---------------------------------------

If you join the group, without a proper interview you will not be able to become a reporter however if you have the Roblox + add notifier on Google you'll be able to see the latest news in Alpha City!
